title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When resizing a view like the Navigator to a smaller size on Linux running build 20011127 (but not on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items move below the label.
EB: The tool items should remain aligned with the label and not move down when the view is resized smaller.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open the Navigator view on Linux running build 200111272. Resize the view to a smaller size3. Observe that the tool items move below the label
